short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add line numbers to poems on PoetryFoundation.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically adds line numbers to poems on the PoetryFoundation.org website, enhancing readability and making it easier to reference specific lines. It intelligently skips headers and maintains the original formatting of the poems.
